name: @eusilvio/cep-lookup
description: A modern, flexible, and agnostic CEP lookup library written in TypeScript.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && esbuild src/index.ts src/providers/index.ts --outdir=dist --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && esbuild src/index.ts src/providers/index.ts --outdir=dist --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --minify

author: Silvio Campos
